Package org.epics.ioc.channelAccess

Interface Summary
ChannelProcessor Interface for requesting the channel be processed.
ChannelProcessorProvider Interface implemented by code that can process a record,
ChannelProcessorRequester An interface implemented by a channel process requester.
ChannelProvider Interface implemented by code that can provide access to the record to which a channel connects.
MonitorAlgorithm The algorithm for monitoring.
MonitorCreate An interface implemented by code that implements a monitor algorithm.
MonitorQueue A queue for monitors.
MonitorQueue.MonitorQueueElement Each queue element provides a PVStructure, changedBitSet, and overrunBitSet.
 

Class Summary
BaseMonitor A Base class for implementing a ChannelMonitor.
ChannelAccessFactory  
ChannelProviderFactory Factory and implementation of local channel access, i.e.
MonitorOnAbsoluteChangeFactory  
MonitorOnChangeFactory  
MonitorOnPercentChangeFactory  
MonitorOnPutFactory  
MonitorQueueFactory Factory that creates a MonitorQueue.
